pkgmetadata.longdescription: Settings and File I/O using a Configuration YAML File // R data pipelines commonly require reading and writing data to versioned directories. Each directory might correspond to one step of a multi-step process, where that version corresponds to particular settings for that step and a chain of previous steps that each have their own versions. This package creates a configuration object that makes it easy to read and write versioned data, based on YAML configuration files loaded and saved to each versioned folder.
